name: Drifting Worlds
description:
This game is being made because I was dissatisfied with the gameplay of normal grapple-hook games and if you have any input or requests or want to be a part of the development of future games, you can join our Discord server (Click the icon in-game). You're also welcome if you just want to hang out and have a chat.

Further development on this game includes a story, sound and possibly rope-physics (I tried it, not exactly easy to do), but no promises.
